title: How to Set, Reset, Remove and Recover the Password of MS Word Files

steps.title: Open the Word file you want to protect.
steps.content: Open the Word file you want to protect. Click the Microsoft Office Button.on the top left side, and then click to ->Prepare->Encrypt Document.

steps.title: In the Encrypt Document dialog box, input a password in the Password box and click OK.
steps.content: In the Encrypt Document dialog box, input a password in the Password box and click OK.

steps.title: In the Confirm Password dialog box, enter the previous password again and click OK.
steps.content: In the Confirm Password dialog box, enter the previous password again and click OK.

steps.title: At last, save the password and the MS word 2007 file.
steps.content: At last, save the password and the MS word 2007 file.

steps.title: Open the Word file and enter the password.
steps.content: Open the Word file and enter the password. Click the Microsoft Office button.Click Save As, and on the bottom of the Save As dialog box, click Tools.

steps.title: On the Tools menu, click General Options.
steps.content: On the Tools menu, click General Options. The General Options dialog opens.

steps.title: Under File sharing options for this document, in the Password to modify box, type a password.
steps.content: Under File sharing options for this document, in the Password to modify box, type a password.

steps.title: In the Confirm Password dialog, re-type the password.
steps.content: In the Confirm Password dialog, re-type the password. Click OK.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save.

steps.title: Enter the password to open the document.
steps.content: Enter the password to open the document. (Note: If you forgot or lost your Word password, you have to recover Word password using the MS Word password recovery tool.)

steps.title: Click the Microsoft Office button.
steps.content: Click the Microsoft Office button. , point to Prepare, and then click Encrypt Document.

steps.title: In the Encrypt Document dialog box and in the Password box, delete the encrypted password, then click OK.
steps.content: In the Encrypt Document dialog box and in the Password box, delete the encrypted password, then click OK.

steps.title: Save the file.
steps.content: Save the file.

steps.title: Use password cracker if you forgot what password you have set for the document.
steps.content: Use password cracker if you forgot what password you have set for the document. It's impossible to recover password using standard Word functionality.

steps.title: Google "password find online" to find the password cracker.
steps.content: Google "password find online" to find the password cracker.

steps.title: Press the "Unprotect your file" button.
steps.content: Press the "Unprotect your file" button.

steps.title: Choose what document you want to unprotect using "Browse", then click "Next step".
steps.content: Choose what document you want to unprotect using "Browse", then click "Next step".

steps.title: Select Remove password method.
steps.content: Select Remove password method.

steps.title: Wait a couple of minutes.
steps.content: Wait a couple of minutes.

steps.title: Download the unlocked document using the download link.
steps.content: Download the unlocked document using the download link.

steps.title: For big files - download a demo document.
steps.content: For big files - download a demo document. You'll need a license key to get the fully unlocked one.

steps.title: Click Open and select the word file.
steps.content: Click Open and select the word file.

steps.title: Choose one of the attack types to recover Word 2007 password.
steps.content: Choose one of the attack types to recover Word 2007 password.

steps.title: Attack settings.
steps.content: Attack settings.

steps.title: Click Start on the taskbar until the operation is finished.
steps.content: Click Start on the taskbar until the operation is finished.

steps.title: Click OK, and you will find the password in the box.
steps.content: Click OK, and you will find the password in the box.
